OpenXava Quick Start

To start with OpenXava follow the Quick Start Guide from openxava.org.

Other documentation

  • To create your first OpenXava project read the chapter 2 of the reference guide or the chapter 4 of the OpenXava book.
  • For a formal introduction to OpenXava read the chapter 1 of the reference guide or the chapter 1 of the OpenXava book.
  • There is a complete OpenXava reference documentation available for free in the wiki in English, Spanish, French, Russian and Chinese.
  • The API doc is in: openxava.org/OpenXavaDoc/apidocs/
  • Find more documentation in the OpenXava wiki and the documentation section of OpenXava site.

If you are already using OpenXava

  • Follow the migration guide to update your project.
  • Read the changelog to know the new features and bug fixes.
